SEARCH
Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Interface Engine.GLBackendState

Enclosing interface:
Engine
public static interface Engine.GLBackendState
A Context's cache of backend context state can be partially invalidated. These enums are specific to the GL backend.
See Also:
  • DirectContext.resetContext(int)
